title: Cane Creek unleashes the murderous limited edition El Asesino eeBrake, says goodbye to direct mount?
content:
Since 2017 Cane Creek has delivered custom versions of their eye-catching eeBrakes to the masses. Tempering the production to only two limited-edition offerings each year — once they’re gone, that’s it. The newest limited edition to the Cane Creek eeBrakes collection (and the last version of the year) is El Asesino — The Murderer. This

The post Cane Creek unleashes the murderous limited edition El Asesino eeBrake, says goodbye to direct mount? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
